content: If you want to add a new column to a GeomVertexData, or modify the format of an existing column, you will have to create a new geomvertexformat that includes the new column (see defining-your-own-geomvertexformat), and then change the format on the GeomVertexData via vdata.set_format(format) <.GeomVertexData.set_format>. This call will internally adjust all of the data to match the new format. (Because of this internal adjustment, it is important to do this before you create the first GeomVertexWriter or GeomVertexReader.)
